titleStmt.title: O inhabitants of the earth, hear the Word of the Lord, his powerful Word, concerning his purpose and decree against the rulers and governours of this nation, and against the inhabitants thereof, who hath rejected the counsel of the Lord
titleStmt.author: Willer, Laurence.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the originals in the Bodleian Library (Early English books) and the British Library (Misc. Brit. tracts).
